Key Match Events: Tyrese Haliburton scored 33 points and handed out 15 assists, leading the Pacers to a 128-115 win over the Heat.
Myles Turner added 21 points for the Pacers.
Pascal Siakam had 18 points and 11 rebounds for the Pacers.
Kel’el Ware led the Heat with 25 points.
Bam Adebayo scored 20 points for the Heat.
Tyler Herro added 17 points for the Heat.
Terry Rozier had 16 points for the Heat.
Jimmy Butler scored nine points and didn’t play in the fourth quarter for a second consecutive night.
Indiana made 17 3-pointers and the Pacers are now 8-2 this season when connecting at least 15 times from beyond the arc.
Thursday was the 25th anniversary of Miami's first game at what is now called Kaseya Center.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Thursday was the 25th anniversary of Miami's first game at what is now called Kaseya Center. The Heat beat Orlando 111-103 on opening night, Jan. 2, 2000. They're now 736-395 in the building, including 86-36 in playoff games.
